mapper.select: SELECT rno, menuno, title,menutype, explanation, spiciness, file1,file1saved, thumb, imagesize FROM menu where rno = #{ rno}
mapper.insert: insert into menu(rno, menuno, menutype, title, explanation, spiciness, file1, file1saved, thumb, imagesize) values(#{rno}, menu_seq.nextval, #{menutype}, #{title}, #{explanation}, #{spiciness}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb}, #{imagesize} )
mapper.delete: delete from menu where menuno = #{ menuno}
